name: Little Green Soldier
description:
You are Green, an alien with the unique ability to absorb enemy projectiles and fire back! Can you make your way through the armies of robots out to get you?

This game was inspired by NES classics like Mega Man and Super Mario Bros, which I have had the good fortune to play as a child.

I developed this game in my spare time over a span of 4 years, logging my progress and incorporating public feedback on Scirra Forums. I've updated the game more than 10 times with new mechanics, new cutscenes and numerous bug fixes.

Attracted 10,000+ plays across 100+ countries on Scirra Arcade!
